Web management

covid.gov.cz is under full management of NAKIT, s.p., which handles operations within the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

About creators

Website is being created thanks to the initiative of Dominika Feriho in cooperation with pro-bono experts Česko.Digital, NAKIT team and content team of the portal.

Big thank belong also to the colleagues of korona.gov.sk.

Content and it's sharing

Content is available under the Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 International Licence, except where otherwise stated.
